jobsDetails.title: Accounts Executive - Coimbatore
jobsDetails.job_description: As an Accounts Executive, you will manage day-to-day accounting operations, including processing invoices, handling tax filings, preparing financial reports, and managing payroll. You will ensure compliance with company policies and tax regulations, and collaborate with internal teams to maintain accurate financial records. Strong analytical skills and a solid understanding of accounting principles are essential for success in this role.
key_response: Maintain financial records, invoices, and accounts payable/receivable.
Assist in the preparation of monthly and annual financial reports.
Process payroll and ensure compliance with tax regulations.
Reconcile discrepancies in accounts and resolve accounting issues.
Work with auditors during audits.
